    • attempLogin

      public static void attempLogin(String u, String p)
      Tries to see if the username and password are in the database and if there is no user, creates one. Used to Log in
      Parameters:
      u - The username
      p - The password

    • serverPuntuation

      public static double serverPuntuation()

      Returns:

    • loginInCheck

      public static boolean loginInCheck(String u, String p)
      Checks if the username or the password comply the minium requeriments
      Parameters:
      u - The username
      p - The password
      Returns:
      True if the parameters are wrong. False if everything is ok.
